mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_ID, NAME_K, AGE FROM GC_MOVIE

SELECT DISTINCT M.MOVIE_ID, M.NAME_K, M.AGE FROM (SELECT * FROM GC_THEATER_SCHEDULE TS INNER JOIN GC_THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID) STS INNER JOIN GC_MOVIE M ON STS.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID WHERE STS.CNAME = #{cname} OR STS.LNAME = #{lname} OR TO_CHAR(STS.MSTARTHOUR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{mstartdate}
SELECT DISTINCT CNAME, CORDER FROM GC_THEATER ORDER BY CORDER

SELECT DISTINCT T.CNAME, T.CORDER FROM GC_THEATER_SCHEDULE TS INNER JOIN GC_THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID WHERE TS.MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id} OR TO_CHAR(TS.MSTARTHOUR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{mstartdate} ORDER BY T.CORDER
SELECT DISTINCT T.LNAME, T.CORDER FROM GC_THEATER_SCHEDULE TS INNER JOIN GC_THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID WHERE TS.MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id} AND T.CNAME = #{cname} ORDER BY T.LNAME
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(MSTARTHOUR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MSTARTDATE FROM GC_THEATER_SCHEDULE ORDER BY MSTARTDATE

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(TS.MSTARTHOUR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MSTARTDATE FROM GC_THEATER_SCHEDULE TS INNER JOIN GC_THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID WHERE TS.MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id} OR T.CNAME = #{cname} OR T.LNAME = #{lname} ORDER BY MSTARTDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GC_RESERVATION VALUES ( GC_RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{theater_schedule_id}, #{movie_id},#{cname}, #{lname}, #{tname}, #{ttype}, TO_DATE(#{mstarthour}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{mendhour}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{name_k}, #{name_e}, #{age}, #{poster}, #{r_time}, #{userid}, #{seat}, #{children}, #{adult}, #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT SEAT FROM GC_RESERVATION WHERE THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleid}
SELECT SEATROWCOUNT, SEATCOLCOUNT, TTYPE FROM GC_THEATER WHERE THEATER_ID = #{THEATER_ID}
